name: Wartrol
short_description:
You guys may have heard of warts, and this review will will be about Wartrol, which is a product that gets rid of warts for you. Before we start i'd like to point out that there are multiple types of warts and that this product might not work on all of them.
It has been proven that it works of plantar warts and common warts but for example, it doesn't appear to work on genital warts.

Also the results might be different for each person.
Wartrol uses high-quality ingredients, approved by the FDA and clinically proven to work. You simply cover up the zones of your skin that have warts, with Wartrol, and repeat the process, results should be seen in a few days or a couple of weeks.
